name: 战斗不能
note:
当HP为0时，
将会自动附加1号状态。

name: 防御
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
target.setStateTurns(2, 1);
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Turn Start Effect>
var turns = user.stateTurns(2);
turns = turns - 1;
if (turns == 0)
{target.removeState(2);}
if (turns > 0)
{target.setStateTurns(2, turns);}
</Custom Turn Start Effect>

<Show Turns>

<Help Description>
  受到伤害降低，持续1T
</Help Description>
